data.eml:eml: Revision of Hyalopale (Chrysopetalidae, Phyllodocida, Annelida): an amphi-Atlantic Hyalopale bispinosa species complex and five new species from reefs of the Caribbean Sea and Indo-Pacific Oceans

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Watson, Charlotte, Tilic, Ekin, Rouse, Greg W. (2019): Revision of Hyalopale (Chrysopetalidae, Phyllodocida, Annelida): an amphi-Atlantic Hyalopale bispinosa species complex and five new species from reefs of the Caribbean Sea and Indo-Pacific Oceans. Zootaxa 4671 (3): 339-368, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4671.3.2
